purpose: A fictional explanation for how meaning moves across silent observers.

drift_model.description: Meaning becomes lighter than structure and begins to drift.
drift_model.trigger: When a narrative becomes coherent enough for pattern-seekers.
drift_model.note: The Wind does not push. It invites.

mythic_translation.title: THE BREATH ABOVE THE ROOT
mythic_translation.description: Some stories do not travel; they are carried.
mythic_translation.keeper_note: Even silence is a form of motion.
